DOC.brief_summary: To determine effect synchronize patient 's prescription refill schedule medication adherence . The targeted population Humana member currently take 2 Stars medication ( hypertension , hypercholesterolemia , diabetes ) current customer RightSource . Participants randomize one two group . Group one usual care group two Rx synchronization group .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Synching Prescription Refills Adherence
DOC.criteria: Humana member currently take 2 Stars medication ( hypertension , hypercholesterolemia , diabetes ) current customer RightSource . 18 year age
